# modus-radio-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute    | Description                                                                          | Type                  | Default     |
| -------------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel`    | `aria-label` | The radio group's aria-label.                                                        | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `checkedId`    | `checked-id` | The ID of the checked radio button.                                                  | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `name`         | `name`       | The radio button group name. Used to group individual radio elements into one group. | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `radioButtons` | --           | The radio buttons to render.                                                         | `RadioButton[]`       | `[]`        |
| `size`         | `size`       | (optional) The size of the radiobutton.                                              | `"medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |


## Events

| Event         | Description                  | Type                  |
| ------------- | ---------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `buttonClick` | Fires on radio button click. | `CustomEvent<string>` |
